p: The values were presented in mean ± SEM (standard error mean), where a p < 0.05, b p < 0.01, c p < 0.001 and d p < 0.0001 were considered as statistically significant. The statistical analysis followed by one-way analysis of variance ANOVA (Dunnett’s test) compared to the negative control (1% Tween-80) using GraphPad Prism version 6.0 (GraphPad Software Inc., San Diego, CA, USA).
